item.title: tornado-warning-3-31.html
item.description: Just came up from the basement after a Tama Co. tornado warning, and the wind is picking up again. ðŸŒª No visible damage outside, but I did find a puddle of pea size hail about 10 minutes after the storm. -/-/-/ location: Toledo, IA
